meanings.definition: Showing shrewdness and good judgment; clever.
meanings.sent1: The fox was cannier than the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent2: She became cannier with each puzzle she solved.
meanings.sent3: The cannier squirrel outsmarted the mischievous raccoon.
meanings.sent4: His cannier approach to negotiations always led to successful deals.
meanings.sent5: Being cannier in tricky situations can help you make better decisions.

meanings.definition: More careful and cautious than others.
meanings.sent1: The cannier driver always obeyed traffic rules.
meanings.sent2: As she grew older, she became cannier about who she trusted.
meanings.sent3: The cannier explorer double-checked his map before venturing into the unknown.
meanings.sent4: Her cannier nature saved her from falling for scams.
meanings.sent5: It's important to be cannier when dealing with strangers online.
